name: Shroot (skvizas)
description:
"Shroot" is a metroidvania-style platformer that features a mushroom character as the main protagonist. The main character must navigate through a level to return to family where it belongs. The gameplay is based on the challenge that the mushroom can only walk on surfaces with mycelium underneath, otherwise it has limited time before it explodes.

The game combines classic platformer elements with exploration to create an entertaining experience for the player. The only level in "Shroot" will offer several puzzles for the player to overcome until they gather movement mechanic power-ups as they make their way back to their family.

WASD + Spacebar
